page.title: 08Farming,Farms, Scremerston.
page.content: There are two farms in Scremerston and both are the{arable}type growing crops of{wheat}and{barley. One is called Borewell Farm and the other is called Inland Pastures Farm. The grass is used for{silage}and grazed by{cattle}and{sheep. Many years ago there would have been a lot of workers on each farm but today they are managed by very few farm workers.Horses would have been used to do most of the work but now tractors are used for ploughing and most of the other jobs on the farms. The{farm cottages}are not all used by the farmworkers and some are let as holiday cottages or as permanent houses for private individuals.
